mapper.insert: insert into meeting_time(user_id, meeting_id, create_time, end_time) VALUES (#{userId},#{meetingId},#{createTime},#{endTime})
insert into meeting_state(user_name, state, face, phone, meeting_id) values (#{userName},#{userState},#{face},#{userPhone},#{meetingId})
mapper.select: select count(*) as num1, ub.cb as num2, uc.cc as num3 from meeting_state as ua, (select count(*) as cb from meeting_state where state="手动签到" and meeting_id=#{meetingId}) as ub, (select count(*) as cc from meeting_state where state="未签到" and meeting_id=#{meetingId}) as uc where ua.state="自动签到" and meeting_id=#{meetingId};
